body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. My name is Roger Kelly and I'm with Fresh Motors. May I ask for your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Brenda! Could you please provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is brenda.phillips@example.com and my phone number is five five five six zero zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Brenda. One last piece of information we need is your home address. Could you please provide that as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my home address is one two three Main Street, Anytown, USA.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Brenda, for providing those details. We'll keep that information secure. Is there anything specific you'd like to discuss about our services today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed about the inventory availability. I was hoping for more options to choose from.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Brenda. We value your feedback and will work on improving our inventory selection. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Brenda. If you have any further questions or feedback, feel free to reach out to us. Have a great day!
